nodes.title: An Unexpected Task
content: Mr. Harrison calls, asking Alex to pick up three important documents before school tomorrow for extra credit.

nodes.title: Where to go first? (Player Choice)
content: Alex agrees. The player is presented with three locations and can choose the order to visit them.

nodes.title: Event: The Quiet Mug Cafe
content: The barista, Chloe, gives Alex a folder labeled 'Poetry Analysis'.

nodes.title: Event: Old Town Library
content: Alex finds a folder labeled 'Historical Timelines' in a study carrel.

nodes.title: Event: Sunbeam Park
content: SCENE: Sunbeam Park, by the fountain.
Alex finds a waterproof bag with a USB drive under a bench.

nodes.title: Resolution: Go to School
content: This scene triggers after the player has all three items.
Alex leaves the items on the teacher's desk.
